translation.ko: 그래? 내가 미쳤다고? 이걸 다 지어냈다고?

translation.en: -Yes, you making it up. -I'm making it all up?
translation.ko: - 그래, 다 지어냈잖아 - 그럼 이건 뭐지?

translation.en: Then what about this, then? This evidence that I have.
translation.ko: - 그래, 다 지어냈잖아 - 그럼 이건 뭐지? 내가 가진 증거야, 봐

translation.en: [laughing triumphantly] Look at this!
This, well...
This used to, before I fell in the pond, it had numbers
and there was information.
There was people's names, and dates, and addresses,
and all kinds of incriminating things.
I fell in the pond, but you can't read it. But, boy, did I have your ass!
translation.ko: 연못에 빠져서 읽을 수가 없네. 하지만 넌 다 걸렸어!

translation.en: That's nice, Norbit. Really nice. Did you write that yourself? Pathetic.
translation.ko: 그래, 노르빗, 멋지네 네가 직접 쓴 거야? 한심하군

translation.en: Kate, you have to believe me.
Yeah, yeah, believe him, Kate.
Remember the one that got you to sign the papers to steal the orphanage? Remember that?
translation.ko: 고아원 훔쳐가는 서류에 누가 서명하라고 했지?

translation.en: Believe him. Go ahead.
[stifling sob] I'm so sorry, Norbit. I just don't trust you anymore.
translation.ko: 미안해, 노르빗 더 이상 널 믿을 수가 없어

translation.en: Well, well, well, Norbit. You lose again.
Once a loser, always a loser, huh? Now, come on! Let's go!
translation.ko: 한 번 패배자는 영원한 패배자야 자, 이제 가자

translation.en: Yeah, I thought you'd feel that way about it, Kate.
And that's why I took the liberty
of inviting some of Deion's ex-wives down,
so maybe they could tell you for themselves.
Ladies!
Hello, Antoine. I've been looking for you.
translation.ko: 안녕, 앙투안 - 당신 찾고 있었어 - 아빠!

translation.en: [children] Daddy!
Antoine? He told me his name was Luther!
Who is that ho? He told me he was gay.
No, no, no. Y'all got me confused with my gay twin brother, Antoine Luther.
translation.ko: 제 게이 쌍둥이 앙투안 루터와 저를 헷갈리시는군요

translation.en: -You dead, gold digger! -[woman 2] Get your butt back here!
translation.ko: - 넌 이제 죽었어! - 이리로 오지 못해!

translation.en: I'm out!
Looks like the wedding's off, bro.
Church!
-God damn it, Norbit! -Oh, snap!
Get him!
Norbit!
[Norbit] Mother Mary! Jesus! Noah! Christ!
Good.
You going somewhere, Norbit?
-You messed up, boy. -That's right.
Now you gonna pay. Big time!
Latimore! Keep your fakakta hands off him!
Go back to your shop, Abe, before I kill you, too!
Hey! You gonna have to kill me as well!
-Yeah, and me, too! -[trimmer buzzing]
Rasputia!
[whispering] How you doing?
I kick the shit out of you.
Mind your goddamn business. Mind your business. Get out of here.
translation.ko: 당신들 일이나 신경 써 신경 꺼. 여기서 나와, 나오라고

translation.en: No, you didn't!
Bye-bye.
Bring it, bitches!
Oh, hell to the no.
Mrs. Henderson is tripping, huh? Get your...
You crazy little old bitch. -How you doing? -[screaming]
Get out of the way.
His ass is mine.
'Sputia? Rasputia?
You remember "till death do us part," don't you, Norbit?
No!
[Mr. Wong] Whale, ho!
Did somebody just call me a whale?
translation.ko: 지금 누가 날 고래라고 부른 거야?

translation.en: Yeah, and a ho!
Bingo! Right in the blowhole!
Let's get some. We dead.
-Oh, shit! Oh, shit! Oh, shit! -Come on!
[Kate] Norbit!
Are you all right?
All right? This is the best I've ever felt in my whole life.
translation.ko: 괜찮냐고? 내 인생에서 가장 기분이 좋은데

translation.en: -Come here. -Mmm!
[Pope Sweet Jesus] Proud of that boy.
Yes. Yes, very proud of Norbit. He like my son.
translation.ko: 그래, 정말 자랑스럽죠 내 아들 같아요

translation.en: I'm sorry I doubted you.
[Norbit] In the end, I guess you could say everything worked out just fine.
Kate and I took over the orphanage, and it was a dream come true.
translation.ko: 케이트와 저는 고아원을 샀고, 꿈을 실현시켰어요

translation.en: Oh, and we also got married. Again.
I love you, Kate.
Ditto.
And I now pronounce you my wife.
And I pronounce you my husband.
[reverend] You may kiss the bride.
What you mean, "Eww"? No, "Eww." Man kiss a woman, beautiful thing.
translation.ko: 왜 야유를 보내지? 남녀가 키스하는 건 아름다운 거야

translation.en: Ling Ling. Come here with your fine self.
I now pronounce you man and wife.
[Norbit] As for Rasputia and the rest of the Latimores,
we never heard from them again.
Rumor has it they settled somewhere in Mexico
translation.ko: 들리는 바로는 멕시코 어딘가에 클럽을 열었다고 해요

translation.en: and opened the club.
translation.ko: 들리는 바로는 멕시코 어딘가에 클럽을 열었다고 해요 "엘 니폴라폴리스"

translation.en: I guess they're living their dream, too.
Say, man, don't you have any better-looking girls than that?
translation.ko: 이봐, 여기 더 나은 여자는 없어?

translation.en: Our best girl's coming out right now.
[announcer] Rasputia!
Hold on now...
Ain't nothing going down there unless it got the word "peso" written on it.
translation.ko: 돈이 아니면 여기 들어올 수 없어

translation.en: How you doing?
